fields_of_interest: Trade, Customs, Environment, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action
head_office_address: The Baltic Exchange St. Mary Axe
eu_initiatives: Customs, maritime policy, port policy, environmental issues, e-maritime, short sea shipping, border controls (including health and phytosanitary protection, immigration controls - Schengen Agreement), environmental issues affecting shipping and ports.
organisation_name: European Community Association of Shipbrokers and Agents (ECASBA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

membership: The International Maritime Organisation, The World Customs Organisation, UNICITRAL, UNCTAD, The Comite Maritime International, The Global Partnership for Sustainable Transport, The Baltic Exchange, BIMCO, INTERCARGO, INTERTANKO, the International Port Community Systems Association
goals__remit: Promoting and protecting the interests of ship brokers and ship agents worldwide.
